items.title: Sagarmala Finance turns into India's first maritime NBFC after registering with RBI
items.description: Sarbananda Sonowal called the Sagarmala Finance's move to turn into an NBFC as a 'major milestone' in India’s maritime journey. Centre has been talking about strengthening the maritime sector as a key growth pillar of the economy.

items.title: Electricity futures can bring down the price of power in the spot market: NSE
items.description: In the initial months after the launch of electricity futures, the exchange will not charge a per transaction fee.

items.title: GACM Technologies to acquire 30% stake in AI edtech firm WeXL at Rs 500 crore valuation
items.description: It has a portfolio of five registered patents, including AI-based subjective answer correction, offline AI learning systems, and English proficiency assessments, the filing stated

items.title: Chart of the Day | Changing contours of domestic consumption story
items.description: Data shows that unbranded players are leading consumption in urban markets

items.title: Magnum Ice Cream Company to acquire Kwality Wall's shares from Unilever group
items.description: Magnum HoldCo will buy 61.9 percent of the issued and paid-up capital of Kwality Wall’s owned by the Unilever group

items.title: Shell says not in discussion with rival oil firm BP for takeover: Report
items.description: The deal, if done, would have been the largest corporate deal this year, according to WSJ

items.title: Vodafone Idea aims for $2.9 billion in loans to bolster network: Report
items.description: The State Bank of India will likely lead a consortium of lenders

items.title: Tata Group first Indian brand over the $30 billion value mark, Eternal joins the top 50 list
items.description: India’s top 10 most valuable brands collectively showed a remarkable double-digit growth in value, according to the latest ranking by Brand Finance.

items.title: Adani, Reliance partner to offer each other's fuels in select outlets
items.description: Under the partnership, select ATGL outlets will offer Jio-bp’s high-performance petrol and diesel, while select Jio-bp outlets will integrate ATGL’s CNG units, enhancing the supply of high-quality fuels to consumers.

items.title: Centre drafts proposal on emission reduction targets for PSU and private refineries, along with textile sector
items.description: A government draft on emission reduction target has for the first time mandated to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by oil PSUs like IOC, BPCL, HPCL, GAIL and ONGC, along with private sector refineries.

items.title: Scale is important, the biggest risk taken so far was Jio, says Mukesh Ambani
items.description: Jio was the 'biggest risk' we have taken so far, said Mukesh Ambani, adding that it was own money being invested, and he was the majority shareholder. "Our worst-case scenario was that it might not work out financially," said Ambani,

items.title: Mukesh Ambani says Reliance aiming to become a deep-tech and advanced manufacturing company
items.description: Reliance's ambition for deep-tech began with the telecom foray, said Mukesh Ambani, when Jio launched 5G in 2021, building every aspect of the service within the company.

items.title: Aditya Birla Lifestyle Brands: What should investors do after the demerger?
items.description: After being carved out as a separate company, ABLBL has set up a roadmap, outlining the growth strategy for the medium term.

items.title: Adani Energy in talks to acquire Megha Engineering’s transmission assets
items.description: The deal talks have come at a time when there is a larger family settlement plan between MEIL’s founding duo - uncle-nephew pair P Pitchi Reddy and PV Krishna Reddy - as they restructure ownership of the construction conglomerate.

items.title: Climate-proof and Profitable: the hidden upside of adaptation investments in India
items.description: Adaptation isn’t just climate insurance but also a smart investment. In India, projects that bolster resilience are delivering powerful profits, showing that climate-proofing can be as lucrative as it is necessary
